registrationPage.title: QALISA NGOKU
registrationPage.subtitle: Yenza i-akhawunti yakho ye-Marito.
registrationPage.errorUnknownNetwork: Kwenzeke imposiso engaziwayo kwinethiwekhi. Nceda uzame kwakhona.

aboutMarito.intro: Igama elithi 'Marito' livela ku-Xitsonga, elithetha 'amagama' okanye 'amagama'. Le yinkqubo yewebhu ehambele phambili edibanisa umsantsa phakathi kolifa oltyebileyo lolwimi loMzantsi Afrika kunye nokufikeleleka kwedijithali yanamhlanje. Abathandi beelwimi, abaphandi be-NLP, kunye neengcali zeelwimi banokusebenzisa iMarito njengeqonga elimanyeneyo ukuze baphonononge, bafake isandla, kwaye bagcine izichazi-magama ezininzi, izichazi-magama, kunye neebhanki zamagama kwiilwimi ezili-11 ezisemthethweni zoMzantsi Afrika.
aboutMarito.mission: IMarito isebenza ngokugqibeleleyo kokubini kwi-intanethi nangaphandle kwe-intanethi, inika amandla uluntu ukuba lufumane izixhobo zeelwimi ezipheleleyo, lunikeze ingxelo, kwaye lusebenzisane ekwakheni ii-lexicons ezomeleleyo kwiilwimi ezinezixhobo ezincinane. Le qonga yinxalenye yephulo eliqhubekayo le-DSFSI (iNzululwazi yeDatha yeMpembelelo yeNtlalo) kwiYunivesithi yasePretoria ukwenza izixhobo zeelwimi zifumaneke luluntu lonke kwaye zikhuthaze uphando lokusetyenziswa kolwimi lwendalo kwiilwimi zaseAfrika.

aboutMofoko.title: Malunga neMafoko
aboutMofoko.content: IMafoko (elithetha “amagama” ngesiTswana) liqonga leelwimi ezininzi eliyilwe ukuze libhiyozelwe kwaye lidibanise iilwimi ezili-11 ezisemthethweni zaseMzantsi Afrika.

whyMafoko.title: Kutheni iMafoko ikhona
whyMafoko.content: Iilwimi zaseMzantsi Afrika zinegazi, ziyachaza, kwaye zinxulumene kakhulu nesazisi sethu, kodwa uninzi lwazo alusabonwa ngokwaneleyo kwihlabathi ledijithali. IMafoko yakhiwe ukuze itshintshe loo meko. Idibanisa amagama neentsingiselo ezivela kwiiglosari ezininzi ibe yindawo enye enokukhangelwa lula, nto leyo eyenza kube lula ngakumbi ukufumana amagama, ukuqonda iinguqulelo, nokufunda kuzo zonke iilwimi ezili-11 ezisemthethweni.
whyMafoko.content2: Nokuba usekwi-intanethi okanye awukho kuyo, iMafoko igcina ulwazi ngeelwimi lufikeleleka. Ikhuthaza nokusebenzisana ngokuvumela uluntu ukuba luphakamise uhlaziyo, lwabelane ngolwazi, kwaye luncede ekuphuculeni umgangatho wokungena kwiglosa nganye ngokuhamba kwexesha.
whyMafoko.content3: Ngokudibanisa izixhobo zolwimi ezazisachithakele zibe liqonga elinye eliphilayo nelikhulayo, iMafoko inceda ekugcineni ilifa lethu ngelixa ixhasa imfundo ebandakanya wonke umntu kunye nophando ngeelwimi zendalo zeelwimi ezineziseko ezilinganiselweyo.

whoMafoko.title: Ngubani oyenzelwe yona
whoMafoko.content: Abafundi, ootitshala, abaphandi, kunye nabani na onothando ngolwimi nenkcubeko.

howMafoko.title: Indlela yokusebenzisa iMafoko
howMafoko.content: Ungasebenzisa iMafoko ukukhangela amagama, uhlolisise iindawo zolwimi ezahlukeneyo, ubone iinguqulelo, kwaye wabelane ngengxelo yakho ukunceda ukuphucula iqonga.
howMafoko.help: Ukuze ufumane inkcazelo eneenkcukacha ebandakanya izikhokelo ezimfutshane kunye nevidiyo zokubonisa, nceda undwendwele

behindProject.title: Ngasemva kweProjekthi
behindProject.content: IMafoko iphuhliselwe iqela leData Science for Social Impact (DSFSI) kwiYunivesithi yasePitoli.

termsAndConditions.title: Imiqathango Nemigaqo
termsAndConditions.welcome: Wamkelekile eMafoko, iqonga leelwimi ezininzi eliphuhliswe nelilawulwa liqela leData Science for Social Impact (DSFSI) kwiYunivesithi yasePitoli. Ngokusebenzisa iMafoko, uyavuma nale Miqathango nemigaqo. Nceda uyifunde ngononophelo phambi kokuba ufikelele okanye unikele iqhaza kweli qonga.
termsAndConditions.purpose: IMafoko (elithetha ukuba “amagama” ngesiTswana) liqonga lemfundo elingajonganga nzuzo elikhuthaza iilwimi ezisemthethweni ezilishumi elinanye zaseMzantsi Afrika ngokubonelela ngamathuba okufikelela kwiiglosa ezininzi kunye neenkqubo zolwimi. Eli qonga lenzelwe ukuxhasa imfundo ebandakanya wonke umntu, uphando, kunye nentsebenziswano phakathi koluntu lweelwimi.
termsAndConditions.user: Ukuze unikele iqhaza eMafoko, njengokungenisa amagama, ukuvota, ukuphawula, okanye ukufaka isicelo sokuba yingcali yolwimi, abasebenzisi kufuneka benze iakhawunti. Uyavuma ukubonelela ngolwazi oluchanekileyo noluthembekileyo xa ubhalisa kwaye ugcine iinkcukacha zakho zokungena ziyimfihlo. I-DSFSI inelungelo lokumisa okanye ukususa iiakhawunti ezophula le miqathango okanye ezithumela umxholo ongafanelekanga.
termsAndConditions.contribution: IMafoko ivumela abasebenzisi ukuba bafake amagama, iinguqulelo, iinkcazo, kunye nezimvo. Ngokunikela ngomxholo, unika i-DSFSI ilayisensi engeyoyodwa, engahlawulwayo yokubonisa, ukuvelisa kwakhona, nokusasaza igalelo lakho ngaphakathi eMafoko ngenjongo yemfundo nophando.
termsAndConditions.contribution2: Zonke iziphumo kufuneka zibe ezifanelekileyo, ezihloniphekileyo, nezilungiselelwe ulwimi. Umxholo onobandlululo, ongahloneliyo okanye okhohlisayo uya kususwa, kwaye ukuphindwa kwetyala kungakhokelela ekumiselweni kweakhawunti.
termsAndConditions.linguist: Abasebenzisi abafuna ukuba ziingcali zolwimi kweli qonga banokufaka izicelo ngokubonelela ngobungqina bezincwadi zabo zophando (ezifana neerekhodi zeGoogle Scholar). I-DSFSI inelungelo lokuhlola nokungqina ubunyani beeziqinisekiso phambi kokunika amalungelo engcali yolwimi.
termsAndConditions.property: Iqonga leMafoko, eliquka uyilo lwayo, isakhiwo, kunye neglosa eziqokelelweyo, liyimpahla yobukrelekrele ye-DSFSI kunye neYunivesithi yasePitoli. Amagama kunye neenguqulelo nganye ziseselempahla yababhali nababoneleli bazo, kodwa zingasetyenziswa kwakhona ngaphakathi eMafoko ngenjongo yemfundo nophando njengoko kuchaziwe apha ngasentla.
termsAndConditions.accuracy: Nangona iMafoko ijolise ekuboneleleni ngolwazi lweelwimi olunembileyo noluthembekileyo, i-DSFSI ayinakuqinisekisa ngokupheleleyo ngokugqibeleleyo okanye ngochaneko lomxholo. Eli qonga linikezelwa 'njengoko linjalo' ngenjongo yemfundo, kwaye i-DSFSI ayinaxanduva ngalo naluphi na uhlobo lweempazamo, ukushiywa, okanye iziphumo ezivelayo ekusebenzisweni kwalo.
termsAndConditions.commercial: IMafoko inikezelwa simahla ngenjongo yemfundo nophando. Akukho mxholo okwiqonga onokuvuselelwa, usasazwe, okanye usetyenziswe ngenjongo yorhwebo ngaphandle kwemvume ebhaliweyo evela kwi-DSFSI.
termsAndConditions.privacy: IMafoko ayisebenzisi ii-cookie, ukulandela umkhondo wedatha, okanye iinkonzo zokuthengisa. Ulwazi lweakhawunti lugcinwa kuphela ukuze luvumele ukuthatha inxaxheba komsebenzisi kunye nokugcina ukusebenza kweqonga. I-DSFSI ayabelani ngedatha yabucala namaqela angaphandle.
termsAndConditions.change: I-DSFSI inokuba ihlaziye le Miqathango nemigaqo ngamaxesha athile ukubonisa uphuculo okanye utshintsho lwemigaqo-nkqubo. Ukuqhubeka nokusebenzisa iMafoko emva kotshintsho kuthetha ukuba uyamkela imiqathango ehlaziyiweyo.
termsAndConditions.contact: Ngemibuzo okanye inkxalabo ephathelele kule Miqathango nemigaqo, nceda uqhagamshelane neqela leData Science for Social Impact (DSFSI) kwiYunivesithi yasePitoli.

feedbackPage.description: Yabelana ngezimvo zakho ukusinceda siphucule inkonzo yethu.
feedbackPage.description2: Sazise ukuba yintoni engahambanga kakuhle ukuze sikwazi ukuyilungisa.
feedbackPage.description3: Singathanda ukuva ukuba yintoni esiyenzayo kakuhle.
feedbackPage.name: Igama (Ongakukhetha)
feedbackPage.compliment: Sazise ukuba yintoni eyenze amava akho abe mahle

termAdditions.deleteContent: Uqinisekile ukuba ufuna ukucima esi sabelo? Eli nyathelo alinakuhlehliswa.
